comments_admi: Reduction in salaries and wages due to Diagnostic staff (Allied Health) being transferred to Bentley, as Allied Health staff consolidated under Allied Health governance. No methodology to split costs has been developed yet
AdmiName: ST JAMES TRANSITIONAL CARE ADULT OTHER MENTAL HEALTH INPATIENT UNIT

comments_admi:
Low occupancy partly due to model of care allowing patients to take leave days over weekends, leave days are not ABF reportable.
Low occupancy also partly due to referral pathways not yet well-established and lack of awareness of admission criteria.

Reduction in salaries and wages due to Diagnostic staff (Allied Health) being transferred to Bentley, as Allied Health staff consolidated under Allied Health governance. No methodology to split costs has been developed yet
AdmiName: ST JAMES TRANSITIONAL CARE ADULT ACUTE MENTAL HEALTH INPATIENT UNIT

comments_admi:
Increased usage of outsourced security due to high acuity patients, to mitigate risks associated with high levels of aggression

Lower occupancy is due to agreement with Corrective Services to accept patient from Banksia Hill detention centre. Highly aggressive patients requiring quarantining of 3 beds for single patient. 

Lower occupancy also due to lower voluntary and low acuity patients due to opening of new Joondalup youth mental health facility, also increasing average acuity of Bentley Youth Unit
AdmiName: BENTLEY HOSPITAL YOUTH MENTAL HEALTH INPATIENT UNIT

comments_admi: Salaries and wages increase due to wage EBA and material increase in revaluation of EMHS leave provisions
AdmiName: BENTLEY HOSPITAL OLDER PERSONS MENTAL HEALTH INPATIENT UNIT

comments_admi:
Increase in salaries and wages due to salary increases in EBA and material increase in revaluation of EMHS leave provisions. Additionally, TCU's Diagnostic (Allied Health) costs have been transferred to Bentley due to costs being transferred to Bentley under governance of Allied Health. No methodology to apportion split

Activity is higher due to relocation of Ward 2K from RPH to Bentley. However, cost profile remains at RPH lowering average cost per bed day
AdmiName: BENTLEY HOSPITAL ADULT MENTAL HEALTH INPATIENT UNIT

comments_admi:
Increases to wage EBA, superannuation, large material revaluation to EMHS leave provisions
Due to challenges faced by Armadale recruiting psychiatrists, continued reliance on locum doctors who are paid at a significant premium
Material use of nursing specials and companions used to mitigate intrusiveness by patients.
AdmiName: ARMADALE HOSPITAL OLDER PERSONS MENTAL HEALTH INPATIENT UNIT

comments_admi:
Increases to wage EBA, superannuation, large material revaluation to EMHS leave provisions
Due to challenges faced by Armadale recruiting psychiatrists, continued reliance on locum doctors who are paid at a significant premium
Material use of nursing specials and companions, due to high demand for Mental Health Act (MHA) patients requiring locked beds
High outsourced security use on inpatient wards, to mitigate aggression, violence, intrusiveness by patients.

comments_admi: Occupancy is low, partly as a result of bed closures for short periods of time. Also, the average length of stay decreased significantly during the year, reducing overall occupancy. Unfortunately, even when bed numbers are low, strict rostering requirements are adhered to, resulting in a high ben day cost.
AdmiName: KALGOORLIE HOSPITAL ADULT INPATIENT UNIT

comments_admi:
Average bed day cost is inflated by increase in medical locum costs along with high cost of security services

Non-salary costs have increased as a result of an increase in outsourced services, including hospital security.
AdmiName: BUNBURY HOSPITAL ADULT OPEN MENTAL HEALTH INPATIENT UNIT

comments_admi: We have had a number of long stay patients unable to be discharged due to social placement issues. They have very long stays.
AdmiName: BUNBURY HOSPITAL ADULT SECURE MENTAL HEALTH INPATIENT UNIT

comments_admi:
Occupancy is down in comparison to 2023/24 partly as a reult of bed closures due to urgent maintenance. For example oner was closed for a 2 week period and others for lesser periods.

Cost is high because of a heavy reliance on Locum doctors. The region has also experienced a heavy casual workforce and has had significant shortfalls in Diagnostic staff, some of which have had to be covered by nursing staff at higher rates of pay. Also, the reduced number of bed days, increases the average cost per bed day because of the ratio of fixed to variable costs.
AdmiName: ALBANY REGIONAL HOSPITAL ADULT MENTAL HEALTH INPATIENT UNIT

comments_admi:
The increase in average wage for Admitted services (Older persons) in the financial year 2024/25 is due to increase in Consultants Psychiatrists which have highest average wage compared to the rest of the staffing categories.

The average patient bed day cost for the Admitted services (Older persons) in the financial year 2024/25 is higher due to increase in Consultants Psychiatrists which have highest average wage compared to the rest of the staffing categories.

The inpatient occupancy is low due to the commencement of the older adult service which gradually increase throughout the financial year.
AdmiName: PARK MENTAL HEALTH SERVICE OLDER PERSONS INPATIENT UNIT
